label: CV Scanning
description: When somebody fills in our Google Forms, download the pdf from the question 3, summarize it and score the candidate on how well they match our requirements. Insert the first 2 questions, the pdf summary, and the score into a Google Sheets document. If the score equals 0, upload the pdf file into 'Rejected candidates' Google Drive, otherwise to 'Potential Candidates' Google Drive.

tasks.label: Download CV
tasks.name: googleDrive_1
tasks.description: Retrieves the CV file from Google Drive using the file ID from the form response.

tasks.label: PDF Helper
tasks.name: pdfHelper_1
tasks.description: Extracts text from the downloaded CV file.

tasks.label: Summarize CV
tasks.name: aiText_1
tasks.description: Use AI to summarize the extracted text.

tasks.label: Score Candidate
tasks.name: openAi_1

messages.content:
Read the following text from a candidate CV:${pdfHelper_1} and compare it against the following job description then score it:

"We are looking for a Senior Java Developer to join our team. If you are looking to give your career a real boost with a global leader in digital transformation, we are perfect choice. If you’d like to learn more about this position and project, apply now!"

Responsibilities
- Being part of an Agile development team
- Contributing to the success of our customer projects
- Development of new product functionality, technical analysis, effort estimation
- Design and implementation of new business requirements
- Working in close cooperation with customer’s representatives
- Leveraging your deep understanding of Java Enterprise Technology (including experience with open source proprietary technology

Requirements
- 5+ years of hands-on Java development experience
- Strong Java EE and/or Spring knowledge
- Good command of English both written and spoken
- Good understanding of design patterns
- Hands-on experience in Cloud technologies is an advantage
- Dedication to high-quality software development through conventions, maintainability, and testing

Nice to have
- Experience with Big Data technologies


Give a score from 1-10 on how compatible this candidate is for the job. 1 means not a good fit, 10 means a perfect fit. If the candidate doesn't have at least 3 year of hands-on Java development experience please give it a score 0.

tasks.description: Uses OpenAI to compare the CV against a job description and assigns a compatibility score.

tasks.label: Record Results
tasks.name: googleSheets_1
tasks.description: Inserts the candidate's name, email, summary, and score into a Google Sheets document.
Directs a stream based on true/false results of comparisons.
tasks.label: Condition
tasks.name: condition_1
